classes.title: Lil Titans
structureSummary: 16-car qualified field
Field expands to 32 cars if 29 or more qualified entries are present
All cars qualify together
Qualifying is based solely on reaction time
Top qualifiers advance to eliminations

classes.title: Rising Titans
structureSummary: 16-car qualified field
Expands to 32 cars with 29+ qualified entries
All cars qualify together; top qualifiers advance
Ladder: Sportsman pairing ladder
7.90 Index
rulesSummary: Vehicle Type: Jr. Dragster vehicles only
Power Type: Fuel-burning internal combustion engines only — electric-powered Jr. Dragsters are prohibited
Driver Age: 13–18 years old License: Valid NHRA Jr. Dragster competition license required Age Verification: Required at first Rising Titans event
Quicker than 7.50 ET or faster than 85.00 MPH → Disqualified from event

classes.title: Titans - 10-5
structureSummary: True small-tire heritage (OG 28×10.5 spirit)
Modern power with controlled parity
Simple rules, easy tech
Multiple combos capable of winning
Exciting side-by-side racing
rulesSummary: Wheelie bars NOT allowed / Except 4 cylinder & Rotary Engines.
Any rear suspension permitted (4-link, ladder bar, leaf)
Wheelbase must remain within ±1 inches of OEM specification.

classes.title: Titans - 275 Drag Radial
structureSummary: True small-tire 275 Radial Heritage (OG 275 radial spirit)
Modern power with controlled parity
Simple rules, easy tech
Multiple combos capable of winning
Exciting side-by-side racing
rulesSummary: Wheelie bars NOT allowed / Except 4 cylinder & Rotary Engines.
Any rear suspension permitted (4-link, ladder bar, leaf)
Wheelbase must remain within ±1 inches of OEM specification.

classes.title: Titans - 4-20ish
structureSummary: All racers must be pre-registered prior to the event deadline.
Drivers Meeting: Chip Draw determines the ET Cap
Two qualifying passes determine the 32-car field.
The closest 32 racers to the ET Cap advance to eliminations (entries under the cap take priority).
Testing opportunities may be available prior to race day.
rulesSummary: Limited to 28x10.5 slick (No W) or 275/60 Radial
Chip Draw Sets ET Cap (4.10, 4.15, 4.20 or 4.25)

classes.title: Titans - 4-50ish
structureSummary: All racers must be pre-registered prior to the event deadline.
Drivers Meeting: Chip Draw determines the ET Cap
Two qualifying passes determine the 32-car field.
The closest 32 racers to the ET Cap advance to eliminations (entries under the cap take priority).
Testing opportunities may be available prior to race day.
rulesSummary: Chip Draw Sets ET Cap (4.45, 4.50, 4.55 or 4.60)

classes.title: Titans - 5-30ish
structureSummary: All racers must be pre-registered prior to the event deadline.
Drivers Meeting: Chip Draw determines the ET Cap
Two qualifying passes determine the 32-car field.
The closest 32 racers to the ET Cap advance to eliminations (entries under the cap take priority).
Testing opportunities may be available prior to race day.
rulesSummary: Chip Draw Sets ET Cap (5.20, 5.25, 5.30, or 5.35)

classes.title: Titans - Outlaw 10-5
structureSummary: A tribute to OG Outlaw 10.5 racing
Unlimited horsepower
Maximum chaos
The loudest, craziest, and meanest cars at the event
A place where screw blowers, big turbos, and multi-stage nitrous cars can unleash hell
rulesSummary: Must resemble an OEM-based or Pro Mod–style DOOR CAR

classes.title: Titans - Outlaw 275 Drag Radial
structureSummary: A tribute to OG Outlaw 275 Drag Radial racing
Unlimited horsepower
Maximum chaos
The loudest, craziest, and meanest cars at the event
A place where screw blowers, big turbos, and multi-stage nitrous cars can unleash hell
rulesSummary: If it fits a 275 Radial tire, it runs

classes.title: Titans 4-90ish
structureSummary: All racers must be pre-registered prior to the event deadline.
Drivers Meeting: Chip Draw determines the ET Cap
Two qualifying passes determine the 32-car field.
The closest 32 racers to the ET Cap advance to eliminations (entries under the cap take priority).
Testing opportunities may be available prior to race day.
rulesSummary: Chip Draw Sets ET Cap (4.80, 4.85, 4.90 or 4.95)

classes.title: Titans Rage - 275 Nitrous Brawl
structureSummary: A tribute Outlaw 275 "Nitrous Power" Drag Radial racing
Unlimited horsepower
Maximum chaos
The loudest, craziest, and meanest cars at the event
A place where screw blowers, big turbos, and multi-stage nitrous cars can unleash hell
rulesSummary: Must resemble an OEM-based or Pro Mod–style DOOR CAR
All major body panels present (hood/fenders/doors/roof/quarters/deck lid/bumpers)
